thumb.name: Confetti %26 Streamers
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EA New Year's Wish Especially for You. Pat%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EThis greeting comes with thoughts of you and wishes for good cheer%26#133;But most of all. a world of love to warm your heart all year!%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: World of Happiness Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy New Year%3Cbr%3Eto Someone Special%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWishing you%3Cbr%3Ea world of happiness%3Cbr%3Eat the new year%3Cbr%3Eand always.

thumb.name: Determination and Work Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EEdmond.%3Cbr%3EYour determination%3Cbr%3Eand hard work%3Cbr%3Ehave brought you%3Cbr%3Eto this Graduation Day...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ECongratulations%3Cbr%3Eand sincere wishes%3Cbr%3Efor all life's very best.

thumb.name: Hope Love Shows! Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EFor You.%3Cbr%3EGrandpa.%3Cbr%3Efrom%3Cbr%3EKayla and Zach%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWho makes happy smiles appear%3Cbr%3EEvery time that he is near?%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWho is loved more%3Cbr%3Ethan he knows?%3Cbr%3EYou are. Grandpa!%3Cbr%3EHope it shows!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Father's Day

thumb.name: Your Special Way Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Father's Day.%3Cbr%3ESteve...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EYou have%3Cbr%3Ea special way%3Cbr%3Eof sharing your life.

thumb.name: Friendly Boo Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHey. Jenny %26#151;%3Cbr%3EBoo!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EIt's only me%3Cbr%3EWith a friendly %26#147;BOO!%26#148;%3Cbr%3EJust to let you know%3Cbr%3EThat I'm thinking of you!

thumb.name: Possessed Card! Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWARNING.%3Cbr%3EMARY BETH!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EThis Halloween card%3Cbr%3Eis POSSESSED!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EBy someone very special!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Halloween

thumb.name: A Lovely Thanksgiving Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EFor you.%3Cbr%3EAunt Sally%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWishing you the real old-fashioned pleasures%3Cbr%3Eof a lovely Thanksgiving Day.

thumb.name: Thanksgiving Fun
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ECharles. Wishing You a Happy Thanksgiving%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWishing you plenty of feasting and fun. And wonderful memories after it's done!%3Cbr%3E
